# AVSampleBufferRequest.Direction.none

**Case**

A single sample will be loaded.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Discussion

When this constant is set, the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest/limitCursor], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest/preferredMinSampleCount], and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest/maxSampleCount] properties are ignored.

## Buffer direction

- **AVSampleBufferRequest.Direction.forward**: The number of following samples may be zero or greater.
- **AVSampleBufferRequest.Direction.reverse**: The number of previous samples may be zero or greater.
